data.text:
Septic Tank Pumping & Cleaning in Charles City County, VA

Commonwealth Waste Solutions is the Septic System maintenance provider of choice in Charles City County, Virginia. We provide the best service at the most competitive rate. We pride ourselves on having the most professional & most knowledgeable staff in the area. We look forward to meeting with you while we perform your service, at the same answering all the septic questions you may have.

Septic tank pumping and cleaning is the most common service we provide in Charles City, but we also offer a wide variety of other septic services for both residential and commercial customers.

The county falls under the Chesapeake Bay Watershed Act, implemented in 1994. This states all septic systems located within the Chesapeake Bay Watershed shall be pumped routinely, every 5 years.

Grease Trap Service

Our commercial service customers in Charles City, VA can depend upon Commonwealth Waste Solutions for all their grease trap disposal needs as well as many other services offered.

Please remember to pump grease traps on a regular basis in order to prevent costly backups from occurring.

Contact us for scheduling and pricing.

We service the Charles City County area from the following location:

10800 Courthouse Rd #51

Charles City, VA 23030

(804) 781-4911
